text_block_list.text: A day off. For Inari One's training, I was out gathering some necessary materials―

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Boss, what a coincidence! What's up, out shoppin' alone?

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Boss, what a coincidence! What's up, out shoppin' alone?

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Nah, the followers are gonna be comin' here to visit soon, so I'm goin' around to the shops. Was thinkin' I could guide them around.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: But, there's too many fancy stores around! I really wanna make a decision, but there are way too many options!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: ……That's it! Can't go wrong with Boss' sense! If you've got any recommendations, can ya tell me?!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: ……That's it! Can't go wrong with Boss' sense! If you've got any recommendations, can ya tell me?!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Oh, thanks! I'm leavin' it to you, Boss!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Oh, thanks! I'm leavin' it to you, Boss!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: What the heck's with this flashy parfait!? It even has a really colorful flower on top of it……Ha～! So this is what they call a flourish!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Oooh!? Everyone's walkin' around in their swimsuits, huh!? And over there, they're dancin'……how nice, it's almost like a festival!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Oh, billiards, right!? I've seen it before! How 'bout it, let's have a one round match!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: There's a bunch of stylish stuff here too, huh. ……Oh, what's that over there?

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: I'm gonna go take a quick look over there!
Inari One was always worrying about everyone else. While looking at anything that caught her interest, she headed deeper in to the store.
Since it seems like her 『followers』 were coming this time, it was a chance to relax, so hopefully she would take it easy.
Until Inari One returned, I stayed nearby waiting―

text_block_list.name: Male Customer
text_block_list.text: Like I said, when I got home and opened it, it was broken! It should be fine to exchange it, right?

text_block_list.name: General Store Clerk
text_block_list.text: However, if there were no problems when it was wrapped up, well……then perhaps it bumped in to something along the way?
At the register, a customer and clerk were arguing. The customer seemed to gradually be getting heated, it seemed like he might get physical with the clerk.
Even if I stepped in, there was the worry that I might get dragged in to it. I approached and called out to try and calm things down.
choice_data_list: Um, how about we calm down and talk this out?

text_block_list.name: Male Customer
text_block_list.text: Huh!? Who are you!? Don't get involved! Or what? Are you going to――

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Hey there, mister! It's good that you're so hot-blooded!
……at the moment things might have reached a tipping point, a small-sized figure entered.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: I heard it all. But, it can't be helped that there would be complaints. How 'bout putting it down in black and white with a one match battle!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: If it's a fight, there'll be no hard feelin's afterwards! Alright, let's get this started! Should it be a race, or how about――

text_block_list.name: Male Customer
text_block_list.text: ……Huh? W-what the heck are you saying……?

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: What, there's no need to worry! If ya need a ref, just leave it to this Inari-sama! I'll decide it fairly with a bang!

text_block_list.name: Male Customer
text_block_list.text: ……I-it's not like I want to settle this with a fight…… Ah-……yeah, it just that……I got a little heated……

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Aw man, so thinkin' you wanted to fight was just a misunderstandin' on my part! Sorry about that, mister! Forgive me.
After being taken aback, the male customer took a look at Inari One's smiling face, he took a deep breath. ……Seems like things have calmed down.

text_block_list.name: Male Customer
text_block_list.text: ……No, it's my fault. It was a present for my girlfriend, so I just lost it for a bit.

text_block_list.name: Male Customer
text_block_list.text: Shopkeeper, and you too……I apologize. You too…… um, thanks for stopping me.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Hey, Boss! To step in like that, you've got quite the guts, huh?

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Hey, Boss! To step in like that, you've got quite the guts, huh?

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Ya could have just pretended to see nothin', that's pretty impressive!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: What the heck, that's kind of embarrassin'! Hehee, but it's not so bad if you're the one sayin' it.
At that time, if Inari One hadn't stepped in, things could have gotten out of hand.
However, it was good that the male customer was able to calm down with just that, if he had gone off the rails……

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Hm? What's wrong? You've got such a serious look on your face. Is there somethin' stuck on my face?
Originally, it was me who stepped in in the first place, however, I'd rather avoid doing anything that might put Inari One in danger.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Hehee, just when I thought you were makin' such a grave face……

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: What the heck are ya sayin', ya moron!! That's my line!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Geez, you're too kind, Boss. Ya can't just go shoulderin' everythin' yourself!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Geez, you're too kind, Boss. Ya can't just go shoulderin' everythin' yourself!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Just like this time, if it had turned in to a fight……that's what ya mean right? But ya see, it's much better than seein' ya get hurt.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: After all, when it comes to power, an Uma Musume like me is stronger. So ya can just leave it all to me!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: When you were lost that time, I was the one that guided ya. And today, you were the one that guided me to a bunch of shops.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: I'll say it again. Clear out those things ya call ears, and listen well. There's no reason for ya to shoulder it all yourself!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Sometimes, ya should just leave it to someone that can handle it. The right person for the right job, right?

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Boss, you're too serious! ……Oh, seems like it's time for the sun to start settin', let's head back!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Boss, you're too serious! ……Oh, seems like it's time for the sun to start settin', let's head back!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: (Boss is always serious and earnest, this Inari-sama, can see that, ya know?)

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: (Boss is always serious and earnest, this Inari-sama, can see that, ya know?)

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: (And because of that, that you'll easily push yourself too hard! Hehee, I need to keep an eye on ya, otherwise I'll be the one worryin'!)

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Alright, I'll tell the followers all about today! 『Inari-sama's trainer was today's guide』 or somethin'!
Once again hitting me on the back, Inari One had a hearty smile on her face.
